metadata.name: Deputy Guardian - Re-enable permissionless `FaultDisputeGame`
metadata.description: This batch updates the `respectedGameType` to `CANNON` in the `OptimismPortal`. This action requires all in-progress withdrawals to be re-proven against a new `FaultDisputeGame` that was created after this update occurs.

metadata.name: Deputy Guardian - Use permissionless `FaultDisputeGame`
metadata.description: Set the `respectedGameType` to `CANNON` in the OptimismPortal
